title: Discipline and self control (TEFC)
creator_credit: J Stone and National Audio Visual Center
brief_description: Discusses the problem of discipline as one of teaching and living with young children. Shows how a teacher can establish control in a friendly climate and prevent disciplinary problems; discusses adequate supervision, the dangers of over and under control and how to help a child accept control. Filmed at various schools in the United States.
